value.title: What Humans Can Learn From 'Human In The Loop' Learning
value.excerpt: Human in the Loop’ Learning describes a setup whereby a learning machine or computer system can incorporate selected human inputs or labels into its inferences or learning process, and thereby create a virtuous cycle or ‘loop’ in which the machine constantly learns to improve its capabilities.
